name: Raise Dead
text: 2:2, put the top card of your discard pile on top of your deck

name: Bastet
text: 2:1, this card retains all changes to points as it resolves (Nourish, starve, boost, oppress)

name: Fishing Boat
text:
2:0, tutor 1 3 times.
(Search for a card that costs 1 and add it to your hand. Search order deck -> discard pile, top to bottom)

name: Angler
text:
4:4, visible, tutor 1.
(Search for a card that costs 1 and add it to your hand. Search order deck -> discard pile, top to bottom)

name: Desert
text:
4:0, modal:
0: +1, later cards this round are worth -2

1-2: Reset
3+: +4
